name: Hotel Tycoon Empire: Idle Game
description:
Hotel Tycoon Empire is an incremental idle clicker & a business simulator game where you are in-charge as a manager of running a small hotel chain and making the incremental business empire grow. The end goal of this game is to make this small motel chain into a grand hotel business empire with multiple rooms & floors and become super rich and famous tycoon!

As a founder you start by running a small motel and then slowly start expanding your motel into a grand five-star hotel with all kinds of luxury rooms for customers and idle fun amenities such as a café, swimming pool, gym, restaurant, a casino, a spa, a massage room and much more! Upgrade your facilities, offer delicious meals and drinks, expand the gym, the café, the restaurant, the swimming pool, keep the rooms clean and build competitive suites.

Features:
*Run your own Hotel like a Business Tycoon
Idle click and Tap through your way from a small motel to a grand hotel empire, create and build everything from scratch, make smart and strategic business decisions, hire smart employees, expand the hotel, run daily operations, take good care of customers and keep them happy.

*Expand the Hotel Business
Expand your motel to hotel from 1st floor to 10th and more floors! You can make the rooms bigger and better as you expand and grow your business. Use Tap tap or idle clicker method and create a gym for customers to workout or let the customers workout by taking a swim in the swimming pool. Create a café or a restaurant, or a casino to play games or go to a Spa to get some skin care or get a massage!

*Hire Employees
To become a hotel tycoon, you need to hire great employees. As the business grows bigger, Manage your staff efficiently you will need to hire multiple employees ranging from a receptionist to a gym instructor for helping out with workout sessions for customers, from a café barista to restaurant waiter, from cleaning staff manager to casino manager to help customers with games and so on. Employ cooks, bartenders or porters and recruit maintenance workers and cleaning service. The employees will help grow your clicker empire!

*Run Operations & Earn Passive Income
Run daily business operations such improving the gym workout sessions or improving the swimming pool or the café, restaurant, casino, spa and massage centers. Organize special tours, diving courses, ski lessons, spa sessions, fun games and sightseeing tours around the premises. Don’t forget to enhance the comfort inside your hotel walls. Give the best possible room service, decorate your hall, improve the resting area, offer the best catering and buffet in town, or tender your laundry service to your visitors during the cleaning time.


*Events & Black Market
You will need to make decisions and manage your customer needs, manage them properly. You can choose to use black market, but beware, you can be caught by the police and you then have to either pay penalty to the police or face prison time. Avoid breaking the law so that you don’t have to face the police or prison time. Be a law abiding citizen and you will not have to see neither the police nor prison time. Just focus on growing your hotel empire.


*Customize Your Hotel
Unlock various items and customize your hotel. You will either get them as free gifts or you will unlock them as you progress further. The quicker you expand your business the more reward opportunities you will get!

*Prestige
There will be times, when after expanding so much, your business slows down a bit, this is the right time to prestige! Prestige helps to reset the games progress and opens up additional fun elements of the game. You can however, choose to start over from scratch again with speedy incremental and idle clicker boost.

If you like management incremental simulators and idle clicker tycoon games, you will enjoy Hotel Tycoon Empire! We want to make Hotel Tycoon Empire the absolute best idle clicker tycoon and incremental management simulator game!
